TEXT.S:
Courtney Alexander (Â·) 4 bulad 27 demiad, 1977 a mihca, Courtney Alexander, miunduay. Courtney Alexander nalecuhan i Bridgeport, Connecticut, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay. Courtney Alexander i 2000 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 13, namapili' tu nu Orlando Magic putiput.
kakuniza
